name: Teleport (EyadTheDeveloper)
description:
You are a little wizard that is trying to complete this once impossible dungeon, however you have one thing your previous opponents didn't: the ability to teleport!

Pressing C will save your position, if you ever press V you will be teleported to the position you saved, allowing you to not get stuck

And your ability isn't limited to just you, you can teleport boxes the same way by pressing B to change modes, don't get them mixed up!

as of 0.1, the game has 5 levels.
